Package abalone

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • abalone.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for maintaining the Abalone game.

        s2 - the third player
        s3 - the fourth player

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the Abalone game.
        Asks after each ended game if the user want to continue. Continues until the user does not want to play anymore.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the game.
        The board is emptied and player[0] becomes the current player.

      • play

        public void play()
        Plays the Abalone game.
        First the initial board (according to the number of players) is shown. Then the game is played until it is over. Players can make a move one after the other. After each move, the changed game situation is printed.

      • doMove

        public boolean doMove​(Move choice)

      • update

        public void update()
        Prints the game situation.

      • printResult

        public void printResult()
        Prints the result of the last game.
